notes: 15 new articles targeting high-volume cybersecurity keywords with strong affiliate conversion potential. Avoids duplicating any of the 22 existing articles.

articles.title: Best VPN for Windows PC in 2026: Top 7 Tested and Ranked
articles.description: A dedicated Windows VPN guide targeting the massive Windows user base. Covers native app quality, kill switch reliability on Windows, WireGuard/NordLynx performance on Windows 11, split tunneling features, and gaming latency. This addresses the most searched VPN platform query that the site currently lacks.

articles.title: Best Antivirus for Windows 11 in 2026: Beyond Windows Defender
articles.description: Targets the huge search volume around Windows 11 antivirus needs. Compares third-party solutions against the built-in Microsoft Defender, with independent lab test scores, real-world detection rates, and system performance impact benchmarks. Strong purchase intent keyword with direct path to affiliate conversion.

articles.title: NordVPN vs Surfshark 2026: Which VPN Is Actually Better?
articles.description: Head-to-head comparison of the site's two primary VPN affiliates. This is a high-volume comparison query since both are top-5 VPN providers. Covers speed benchmarks, server networks, simultaneous connections, pricing tiers, streaming unblocking, and privacy policies. Every click leads to an affiliate conversion opportunity.

articles.title: Best Internet Security Suites in 2026: All-in-One Protection Compared
articles.description: Targets users searching for comprehensive security bundles (antivirus + VPN + password manager + identity monitoring). These all-in-one suites have the highest average order values, making them extremely profitable for affiliates. Compares Bitdefender Premium Security, Norton 360, Kaspersky Premium, and ESET Home Security Ultimate.

articles.title: ESET Review 2026: Lightweight Antivirus for Power Users
articles.description: Standalone review for ESET, one of the site's AWIN affiliate partners that lacks a dedicated review. ESET has a loyal following among tech-savvy users and consistent high marks from AV-TEST. Covers ESET NOD32, ESET Internet Security, and ESET Home Security tiers with real-world performance data.

articles.title: How to Protect Yourself Online: The Complete Digital Security Checklist
articles.description: Evergreen pillar page targeting broad informational queries about online safety. Functions as a hub linking to multiple product-focused articles. Covers VPN usage, antivirus protection, password management, 2FA, safe browsing, social media privacy, and email security. High traffic potential with multiple natural affiliate insertion points throughout the guide.

articles.title: Best VPN for Travel in 2026: Stay Secure on Public Wi-Fi Worldwide
articles.description: Targets travelers concerned about public Wi-Fi security, hotel networks, and accessing content abroad. Covers server coverage in key travel destinations, ease of use, multi-device support, and obfuscation features for restrictive countries like China and UAE. High commercial intent from a demographic willing to pay for security.

articles.title: NordPass Review 2026: Simple Password Manager from the Makers of NordVPN
articles.description: Dedicated review of NordPass, a direct affiliate partner with its own offer ID. Covers the password manager's zero-knowledge architecture, passkey support, data breach scanner, password health checker, and cross-platform apps. Compares against 1Password and Bitwarden to capture comparison traffic as well.

articles.title: Best Parental Control Software in 2026: Keep Your Kids Safe Online
articles.description: Targets parents searching for child safety solutions, a segment with high emotional urgency and willingness to pay. Covers content filtering, screen time management, location tracking, social media monitoring, and app blocking. Many of the site's antivirus affiliates (Bitdefender, Kaspersky, ESET) include parental controls in premium tiers, creating strong upsell opportunities.

articles.title: How to Set Up Two-Factor Authentication (2FA) on Every Account
articles.description: Extremely high search volume informational guide with evergreen relevance. Walks readers through enabling 2FA on Google, Apple, Microsoft, social media, banking, and crypto accounts. Naturally recommends password managers with built-in TOTP authenticators (NordPass, 1Password) as the best way to manage 2FA codes, driving affiliate conversions from an educational entry point.
target_keywords: how to set up two-factor authentication
how to set up authenticator app

articles.title: Kaspersky vs Bitdefender 2026: Which Antivirus Wins?
articles.description: Head-to-head comparison of two major AWIN affiliate partners. One of the most searched antivirus comparison queries. Covers malware detection rates, system performance impact, feature sets, pricing, independent lab results, and platform support. Both options are site affiliate partners so every conversion is monetized regardless of which product the reader chooses.

articles.title: What Is a VPN and Do You Actually Need One in 2026?
articles.description: Top-of-funnel educational content targeting the massive informational query 'what is a VPN'. Explains VPN technology in plain language, covers legitimate use cases (privacy, public Wi-Fi, streaming, remote work), addresses common myths, and guides readers toward the site's review and comparison content. Captures early-stage buyers who then convert through internal linking to product pages.

articles.title: Best Antivirus for Android in 2026: Top Mobile Security Apps
articles.description: Targets the high-volume mobile security segment. Android has over 3 billion active devices and is the primary malware target in the mobile space. Covers real-time scanning, app permission auditing, anti-theft features, Wi-Fi security scanning, and SMS phishing protection. The existing site covers Mac antivirus but has no Android-specific content, leaving a major gap.
target_keywords: do I need antivirus on Android

articles.title: How to Check If Your Personal Data Has Been Leaked (And What to Do Next)
articles.description: Capitalizes on anxiety around data breaches, which are constantly in the news. Covers breach-checking tools like HaveIBeenPwned, dark web monitoring services, credit freeze procedures, and actionable steps after discovering a leak. Naturally funnels readers toward password managers (to change compromised passwords), VPNs (to prevent future leaks), and identity theft protection services.
target_keywords: how to check if my data has been leaked
what to do after data breach

articles.title: Best VPN for Gaming in 2026: Lowest Ping, No Lag
articles.description: Targets the gaming audience, a large and highly engaged demographic. Covers latency benchmarks across popular game servers, DDoS protection, ISP throttling bypass, accessing geo-locked game servers, and reducing packet loss. Gamers are tech-savvy buyers who research thoroughly before purchasing, making them ideal affiliate conversion targets.
